title: Japanese Food Words
description: Discover the vocabulary behind Japanese cuisine, from sushi to ramen and beyond

questions.question: What does the Japanese food term 'umami' refer to?
options: The fifth basic taste, often described as savory or meaty

questions.question: In Japanese cuisine, what is 'dashi'?
options: A fundamental cooking stock made from kelp and bonito flakes

questions.question: What does 'tempura' refer to in Japanese cooking?
options: Seafood or vegetables coated in a light batter and deep-fried

questions.question: What is 'edamame' in Japanese food culture?
options: Young soybeans served in the pod, often boiled and salted

questions.question: In Japanese cuisine, what does 'yakitori' mean?
options: Grilled chicken pieces on bamboo skewers

questions.question: What is 'miso' in Japanese cooking?
options: A fermented soybean paste used in soups and sauces

questions.question: What does 'sashimi' specifically refer to?
options: Thinly sliced raw fish or meat served without rice

questions.question: In Japanese food terminology, what is 'ponzu'?
options: A citrus-based soy sauce used as a dipping condiment

questions.question: What does 'bento' refer to in Japanese culture?
options: A single-portion packed meal in a compartmented box

questions.question: What is 'wasabi' in Japanese cuisine?
options: A pungent green condiment made from the root of the wasabi plant

questions.question: In Japanese cooking, what are 'gyoza'?
options: Crescent-shaped dumplings typically filled with meat and vegetables

questions.question: What does the Japanese term 'kaiseki' refer to?
options: A traditional multi-course Japanese dinner emphasizing seasonal ingredients

questions.question: What is 'mochi' in Japanese food?
options: A chewy rice cake made from glutinous rice pounded into a paste

questions.question: In Japanese cuisine, what does 'teriyaki' literally mean?
options: Glossy grilling, referring to the shine from the glaze

questions.question: What is 'nori' in Japanese cooking?
options: Edible dried seaweed sheets used to wrap sushi
